ingredients.item: 2 essential Waitrose British Chicken Breasts, sliced
150g essential Waitrose Easy Cook Long Grain Rice
2 tbsp grated essential Waitrose Parmigiano Reggiano

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a frying pan and add the onion and chicken for 5-6 minutes until the chicken is browned and cooked through with no pink meat. Add the rice and cook for 1 minute.

Stir in half the stock, cover and cook on a gentle heat for 10 minutes. Add the remaining stock, tomatoes and courgette, cover and cook for 10 minutes until the rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed. Season, and stir in the cheese.
